What's New in Beast 2013.0.x
Beast 2013.0.x
Beast 2012.1.x
 
Migration Guide > Previous Releases > Beast 2013.0.x > 

Upgrade Requirements for 2013.0.x

 
 
 

2013.0.1

There are no code changes needed to compile with this release.

2013

  • ILBCreateManager() has been changed to pass in a GameWare license key as an additional argument.
  • ILBSetErnstGamma() has been replaced by ILBSetErnstDisplayGamma() to ensure a correct gamma pipeline.

Please send us your comment about this page
